overview: 1867. The Civil War is over but in the untamed West, old feuds still burn - and old evils still live. When beautiful madam Lacy Everett decides to pack up her establishment and move it deeper West, she heads for untamed territory and the infamous Fort Doom. But the girls find themselves stranded miles away from their destination, as no traveler dares approach the deadly fort, rumored to be terrorized by a gruesome killer. Determined to set up shop, Lacy and her crew take over the Fort. But the killer is no legend - and he will take what is his...
tagline: Your past has plans for you.
title: Fort Doom
